author: mturk
msg: Use shutdown instead hard close for connected sockets.
This ensures that the FIN will be send to the Tomcat thus
The rewritten shutdown_socket is basically Apache 1.3 linering_close.
It needs testing, but mine tests shows the large decrease in CLOSE_WAIT socket states when connectionTimeout is set on Tomcat side.
